channel.title: Add random pvp drops on death 317
channel.description: how would i go about adding pvp drops on death not delta? been trying to figure this out for a wile now and search everywhere to get a little idea and how to do it but can't figure it out so about time to ask ;D

item.title: Add random pvp drops on death 317
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

make an int in item.java

[code]
public static int Drops[] = {####, ####, ####};

    public static int randomDrops()
    {
        return Drops[(int)(Math.random()*Drops.length)];
    }[/code]

than i think the method is called ifKilledApplyDead or something? and call for that when p2 is killed? im not sure thats just my best guess

Read full topic

Do you know where the code for regular PVP drop are?

If so you can simply just alter the item’s drop to a random array with item IDs and have it randomly give a item…
